View Javadoc

1   package org.lindbergframework.core.context;
2   
3   import java.lang.reflect.Method;
4   
5   import net.sf.cglib.proxy.MethodInterceptor;
6   import net.sf.cglib.proxy.MethodProxy;
7   
8   /**
9    * Proxy to verify if the context is active based in annotated method that using 
10   * {@link AllowIfContextActive} annotation.
11   * 
12   * @author Victor Lindberg
13   *
14   */
15  public class ContextProxy implements MethodInterceptor{
16  	
17      /**
18       * No proxy methods.
19       */
20      private Method[] noProxyMethods;
21      
22  	public ContextProxy(Method... noProxyMethods){
23  		this.noProxyMethods = noProxyMethods;
24  	}
25  	
26  	/**
27  	 * Intercepts the context methods and invokes verifyContext method 
28  	 * in context to verify the context status. 
29  	 */
30  	public Object intercept(Object obj, Method method, Object[] args,
31  			MethodProxy proxy) throws Throwable {
32  		
33  		if (method.getAnnotation(AllowIfContextActive.class) != null){
34  			ComponentContext configuration = (ComponentContext) obj;
35  			configuration.verifyContext();
36  		}
37  		
38  		return proxy.invokeSuper(obj, args);
39  	}
40  	
41  }
